DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability, and activity of NGM282 in patients with Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of NGM282 in Patients With Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis of PSC Clinically significant acute or chronic liver disease of an etiology other than PSC Secondary or IgG4 related sclerosing cholangitis
